name: Lifetime Free-Mint Access: The Noltan Pass

metadata.name: The Noltan Pass #1
metadata.description:
By owning Noltan Pass, these individuals will be considered as OG Supporters, and will be granted a Complimentary-Mint for each new digital exhibition and collection released.

This means that, you will have the unique opportunity to acquire a Free, Limited-Edition Artwork from every future exhibition, allowing you to expand your collection and continue to engage with the artist's evolving vision.

The Noltan Pass is not just a temporary designation; it is a Forever-List, signifying that the early supporters will always hold a special place within the artist's journey and artistic legacy. This Forever-List ensures that OGSupporters will have ongoing access to exclusive perks, including early previews, VIP experiences, and priority access to limited edition releases, establishing a lasting bond between the artist and their dedicated community.

By joining The Noltan Pass, you become part of a select group of individuals who have demonstrated their trust and belief in the artist's vision
